title: SANATH, VAAS IN 30-MEMBER POOL FOR WORLD CUP 2011
content: Sanath Jayasuriya and Chaminda Vaas have been included in the 30-member pool for the World Cup 2011, says Sri Lanka Cricket. The 15-member squad that would take part in the tournament is to be announced on the 19th, a month before the start of the World Cup….
